title: RP Purchase Timers
body:
I feel like the RP purchase timers are really inaccurate and when I go to get RP the timer sometimes instantly resets and other times doesn't reset for a while, is this true or am I imagining it...

Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey summoner,

What do you mean by "the RP purchase timers"? I think I can help, but I'm having trouble understanding the issue. Can you elaborate for me?
